title: 6 years after Michael Brown's death, Ferguson elects first black mayor
description: Outrage erupted in Ferguson, Missouri after Michael Brown was killed by a police officer in 2014. Ella Jones, who became the city’s first black and first female mayor this week, says her election is about “inclusion.”

title: Militarized police response to protests can erode community trust, experts say
description: As protesters gather across the U.S. to demand justice for George Floyd, many have been met with heavily armed police using military-style tactics or the National Guard. Experts say this response can backfire, dividing officers from the citizens they serve.
